sentences.en: A symptom, not a disease, jaundice simply announces that something is wrong with me.
sentences.cn: 黄疸是一种症状, 不是一种病, 只能说明我有毛病了.

sentences.en: Abdominal swelling or pain and jaundice are the presenting symptoms.
sentences.cn: 腹部胀满或疼痛和黄疸是本病的症状.

sentences.en: Afeter 4 weeks of jaundice hepatic energy metabolism did not recover.
sentences.cn: 阻塞4周后,肝能量代谢不能恢复.

sentences.en: ConclusionG 71 R gene mutation combined with G 6 PDdeficiency aggravates the degree of neonatal jaundice.
sentences.cn: 结论G6PD缺乏与G71R基因突变并存加重新生儿黄疸程度.

sentences.en: He was suffering from a sharp attack of jaundice.
I looked into the problem without jaundice of any kind.
sentences.cn: 我研讨这一问题,不怀任何偏见.

sentences.en: Incompatibility between the mother's and the baby's blood groups may cause jaundice.
sentences.cn: 母亲和婴儿血型不合会产生黄疸。

sentences.en: Jaundice, seen best in the sclerae, is an important sign.
sentences.cn: 黄胆以巩膜处最明显, 这是重要的迹象.

sentences.en: Leptospirosis causes severe jaundice, kidney failure and bleeding in the lungs.
sentences.cn: 钩端螺旋体导致严重的黄疸、肾衰竭和肺出血。

sentences.en: Mild jaundice in the newborn is common and often clears without treatment.
sentences.cn: 新生儿有轻微的黄疸较为常见，经常不需要治疗就能自愈。

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate CT after ERCP in the diagnosis of obstructive jaundice.
sentences.cn: 目的评价ERCP后CT对梗阻性黄疸的诊断价值.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the CT appearances and diagnostic value of malignant jaundice.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨恶性胆道梗阻的CT征象 及CT检查在胆道良恶性梗阻诊断中的价值.

sentences.en: People said that he had jaundice and urchins nicknamed him " Yellow Fellow. "
sentences.cn: 别人说他是黄胆病,孩子们也就叫他 “ 黄胖 ” 了.

sentences.en: PrefaceObstructive Jaundice ( Obstructive Jaundice, OJ ) is the common disease in the hepticbile surgery.
sentences.cn: 前言梗阻性黄疸 ( ObstructiveJaundice, OJ ) 是肝胆外科常见的病症之一.

sentences.en: She developed jaundice and a fever of 39.5 degree C.
The "yellow" in the name is explained by the jaundice that affects some patients, causing yellow eyes and yellow skin.
sentences.cn: 名称中的“黄”字由影响一些患者的黄疸使眼睛和皮肤颜色发黄而得到解释。

sentences.en: Yellowness of the eyes is one of the symptoms of jaundice.
sentences.cn: 眼睛发黄是黄疸病的症状之一.

words.tran_cn: 使有偏见（jaundice的过去式）；使患黄疸病

phrases.tran_cn: 梗阻性黄疸；阻塞性黄疸

trans.tran_en: a medical condition in which your skin and the white part of your eyes become yellow
